244309.「フン。ほんとに アタイが見えてるのかい？: Hm. Are you sure they can see me?

244310.「そうよ～ なんといっても\n わたくしの 一番弟子なんだもの。:
Of course～! After all, they're my number one
apprentice.

244311.「<pc>さん。こちらの キャルさんから\n あなたに お仕事の依頼がきてるのよ:
<pc>. Ms. Cal is here with a job
for you. Please hear what she has to say.

244312.「どうやら 見えてるようだね……よかった。: Looks like you can see me... Thank goodness.

244313.「どいつも こいつも アタイのことを\n 無視しやがるから クサクサしてたんだ。:
I've been feeling crummy after being unnoticed
by everyone, like that sleepyhead over there.

244314.「まっ これが デスマスターと一般人の\n ちがいってやつ なのかねぇ。:
I guess that's the difference between death
masters and ordinary people.

244315.「……依頼の話に移ろうか。アタイはさ\n ここの そばにある墓地に 葬られたんだ:
...But let's talk about my request. I was
buried in the graveyard near here, but as you
can see, I'm a wandering ghost...

244316.「心残りがあるせいで 現世にしばられて\n いつまでも 昇天できなくてね。\n:
I'm stuck in this life because I have
lingering regrets and can't move on. I want
you to resolve it for me.

244317.「生前は 用心棒を なりわいにしていたんだけど\n グレン領西で 行商人の護衛を:
Before I died, I was a bodyguard by trade, but
when I was escorting a peddler in Glen West,
we were attacked by monsters...

244318.「客を守るため 敵を引きつけ 奮闘したんだけど\n あえなく 死んじまった……ま:
I fought hard to protect my client by grabbing
the monsters' attention, but ended up dying...
but that's just how the business goes.

244319.「ただね 愛用の扇を かすめ取られたことだけは\n いまだに くやしくってね……:
What bothers me about it though is that they
took my favorite fan... That fan was my pride
and joy as a martial artist!

244320.「グレン領西の中央か 南西あたりにいる\n ウィングデビルを仕留め アタイの扇を:
I need you to take out the Aggrosculpture in
the center or southwest of Glen West and get
my fan back. Please! I'm begging you!

244321.「安心してくださいな。<pc>さんなら\n きっと やりとげてくれます。\n わ:
Don't worry. I'm sure that <pc>
will get it done. You have my guarantee.

244322.「アタイは そろそろ ラクになりたいんだ。\n 頼んだよ……<pc>。:
I just want to be able to rest in peace.
Please... <pc>.

244323.「ちょっと <pc>！\n アンタ 誰と話してるのよ！？: Hey, <pc>! Who are you talking to?

244324.「むっき～！ いいな いいなぁ。\n ずるい！ ずーるーいー！:
Grrrr～! That must be so nice. It's not fair!
Not, fair!!

244325.「アタシなんかさぁ ダーマ神官のとこ行っても\n デスマスターに なれなかったん:
I even went to an Abbey Priest, and I still
couldn't become a death master!

244326.「お前には 素質がない。デスマスターにとって\n 欠くべからざる 霊感というもの:
"You do not have the qualifications. You lack
the necessary spiritual sense to be a death
master!", they said...

244327.「霊感ゼロとか ありえないじゃん もうッ！:
How is it possible for me to have ZERO
spiritual sense!?

244328.「もしもし 幽霊さん……今 そばにいる？\n いたら 返事して。アタシの霊感を:
Helloooo, Mr. Ghost... are you there? If you
are, say something. Prove that I can sense
spirits.

244329.「あらあら まあまあ。お気の毒さまだけど\n 霊感がないんじゃ どうしようもない:
Oh dear, I'm sorry to hear that. But if you
can't sense spirits, there's nothing we can do
about that.

244330.「落ち込んでる ネリムちゃんが\n 気になるだろうけど あなたは 初仕事を\n:
I'm sure you worried about Nelim being down in
the dumps, but you need to focus on getting
your first job done.

246592.「えっ！ デズ師匠と いっしょに 幽霊さんと\n 話してたの！？ アタシが 寝て:
What!? You and Master Dezzie were talking to a
ghost!? While I was sleeping?

246594.「マジで？ 幽霊さん まだ そばにいるの！？: Really? The ghost is still around!?

246595.「あー そっかぁ……デスマスターじゃない\n アタシには 見えないんだろうね……:
Oh... I probably can't see it because I'm not
a death master... maybe...
